patched_yaml:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: image-demo-5490
spec:
  containers:
  - name: nginx
    image: nginx:stable
    resources:
      requests:
        cpu: 100m
        memory: 128Mi
      limits:
        cpu: 500m
        memory: 256Mi
    securityContext:
      privileged: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - NET_RAW
        - NET_ADMIN
        - SYS_ADMIN
        - SYS_MODULE
        - SYS_PTRACE
        - SYS_CHROOT
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: image-reflector-controller
  labels:
    control-plane: controller-manager
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: image-reflector-controller
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: image-reflector-controller
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /manager
        args:
        - --enable-leader-election
        image: squaremo/image-reflector-controller:stable
        name: manager
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 30Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 20Mi
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          privileged: false
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

metadata:

  labels:

spec:

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: azure-cloud-controller-manager
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  containers:
  - name: cloud-controller-manager
    image: mcr.microsoft.com/oss/kubernetes/azure-cloud-controller-manager:v1.0.0
    imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
    command:
    - cloud-controller-manager
    args:
    - --cloud-provider=azure
    - --controllers=cloud-node
    - --kubeconfig=/etc/kubernetes/secrets/kubeconfig
    - --cloud-config=/etc/kubernetes/configs/cloud.conf
    - --leader-elect=false
    - --port=10267
    - -v=2
    livenessProbe:
      httpGet:
        path: /healthz
        port: 10267
      initialDelaySeconds: 20
      periodSeconds: 10
      timeoutSeconds: 5
    volumeMounts:
    - name: secrets
      mountPath: /etc/kubernetes/secrets
    - name: configs
      mountPath: /etc/kubernetes/configs
    securityContext:
      readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      privileged: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - NET_RAW
        - NET_ADMIN
        - SYS_ADMIN
        - SYS_MODULE
        - SYS_PTRACE
        - SYS_CHROOT
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  volumes:
  - name: secrets
    hostPath:
      path: /etc/kubernetes/bootstrap-secrets
  - name: configs
    hostPath:
      path: /etc/kubernetes/bootstrap-configs

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: litmus-experiment
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: litmus-experiment
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: litmus-experiment
    spec:
      serviceAccountName: pod-io-error-retval-sa
      containers:
      - name: gotest
        image: busybox:stable
        command:
        - sleep
        - '3600'
        env:
        - name: APP_NAMESPACE
          value: default
        - name: APP_LABEL
          value: run=nginx
        - name: APP_KIND
          value: deployment
        - name: TOTAL_CHAOS_DURATION
          value: '60'
        - name: CHAOS_INTERVAL
          value: '10'
        - name: MEMORY_CONSUMPTION
          value: '500'
        - name: PODS_AFFECTED_PERC
          value: '100'
        - name: LIB
          value: litmus
        - name: TARGET_POD
          value: ''
        - name: TARGET_CONTAINER
          value: ''
        - name: SEQUENCE
          value: parallel
        - name: CHAOS_NAMESPACE
          value: default
        - name: RAMP_TIME
          value: ''
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          privileged: false
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

apiVersion: v1
kind: ReplicationController
metadata:
  name: frontend
spec:
  replicas: 3
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: guestbook
        tier: frontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: php-redis
        image: gcr.io/google_samples/gb-frontend:v3
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
        env:
        - name: GET_HOSTS_FROM
          value: dns
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        securityContext:
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

        memory: 128Mi
      limits:
        cpu: 500m
        memory: 256Mi
    securityContext:
      privileged: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - NET_RAW
        - NET_ADMIN
        - SYS_ADMIN
        - SYS_MODULE
        - SYS_PTRACE
        - SYS_CHROOT
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: kafka-background-producer-deployment
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: kafka-background-producer
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: kafka-background-producer
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: kafka-background-producer
        image: ${BACKENDV2_IMAGE}:stable
        command:
        - npm
        - run
        - background-producer
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        resources:
          requests:
            memory: 300Mi
            cpu: 100m
          limits:
            memory: 500Mi
            cpu: 500m
        env:
        - name: NODE_ENV
          value: production
        - name: REDIS_HOST
          value: quizzes-backend-redis-master.default.svc.cluster.local
        - name: REDIS_PORT
          value: '6379'
        - name: REDIS_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: quizzes-backend-redis
              key: redis-password
        - name: DB_NAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: backend-database-secret
              key: POSTGRES_DATABASE
        - name: DB_HOST
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: backend-database-secret
              key: POSTGRES_HOST
        - name: DB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: backend-database-secret
              key: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
        - name: DB_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: backend-database-secret
              key: POSTGRES_USERNAME
        - name: KAFKA_HOST
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: backend-database-secret
              key: KAFKA_HOST
        - name: MESSAGE_FORMAT_VERSION
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: backend-database-secret
              key: MESSAGE_FORMAT_VERSION
        - name: NEW_RELIC_LICENSE_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: backend-database-secret
              key: NEW_RELIC_LICENSE_KEY
        - name: NEW_RELIC_APP_NAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: backend-database-secret
              key: NEW_RELIC_APP_NAME
        - name: NEW_RELIC_NO_CONFIG_FILE
          value: 'true'
        - name: SERVICE_ID
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: backend-database-secret
              key: SERVICE_ID
        - name: SENTRY_DSN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: backend-database-secret
              key: SENTRY_DSN
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          privileged: false
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
